home.title: Educational Programs
home.subtitle: Offering young people the opportunity to open up to the world, grow, learn and flourish within cultural and linguistic diversity.

about.1901: Founded with passion and dedication, Hillcrest is a 1901 association that fully embodies the founding principles of this legal structure. Registered as a non-profit association, Hillcrest is committed to serving and supporting its community with ethics and transparency
about.mission_text: Hillcrest's mission is to develop educational programs for curious, open-minded teenagers who want to have a cultural and linguistic experience. We pride ourselves on developing quality partnerships in different countries.
about.list_title: The values ​​that our programs carry are:
